channel.title: This Advertising Bullshit
channel.description: k, last chance when some faggot pm'd everyone on the site. This needs to be fixed. 'rsps community' has been advertising on mscp for the last month and barely anyone did anything. Solutions? please

item.title: This Advertising Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You probably didn’t use the Report to admin button and thought that it would magically get solved on it’s own. I’ve already banned one of the faggots that just spammed that site here and will ban any more if they are reported.

Read full topic

item.title: This Advertising Bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

Phaze One:

k, last chance when some faggot pm’d everyone on the site. This needs to be fixed. ‘rsps community’ has been advertising on mscp for the last month and barely anyone did anything. Solutions? please

L2DDoS then Own em.

That’s what I’m about to do when I see 1 more post or PM about it.

Oh ya, that kid sent me a MSG saying he can have my Internet shut off and black listed since his dad works for an Internet company.

I declare faggotry on that one.

Read full topic
